metadata.title: CVE-2016-3731 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Moodle 3.0 through 3.0.3, 2.9 through 2.9.5, and 2.8 through 2.8.11 allowsremote attackers to obtain the names of hidden forums and forumdiscussions.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
